references.paper_title: Networks of spiking neurons: the third generation of neural network models
references.reason: This paper is foundational for the field of spiking neural networks (SNNs), introducing a new generation of neural network models based on spiking neurons.

This highly influential paper introduced the Transformer architecture, a crucial component in many modern deep learning models, including the positional encoding techniques relevant to the present study.

references.paper_title: Deep residual learning in spiking neural networks
references.reason: This paper significantly advanced the capabilities of SNNs by applying deep residual learning, a technique crucial for training deep neural networks effectively.

references.paper_title: Spikformer: When spiking neural network meets transformer
references.reason: This paper proposed Spikformer, a novel SNN architecture that combines the strengths of spiking neurons with the transformer architecture, demonstrating significant advancements in sequential modeling.
This paper introduced another cutting-edge SNN architecture that integrates spike-based computation with the transformer architecture, further improving sequential modeling capabilities.
